Received

File

y an opening in their Pekin 
office will then an lakind 
le charge of it finding yet 
uno I madecal college gul 
Rockeffeller Foundation Jo Lave 
work and two weeks and shall

continue to work until tu 15th 
of seplember when I leave Besten 
for the west. Jam learning a 
great deal hem and have determined 
to stick as long as I have time I 
do so

Ana 536 Commonwealet Ave

Doston Mar 
Answered 522

19 August 22,1919 
My dear to. Stearus, 1956

Miss Lee had a 
pretty bad allack of cronie 
appendicitis last week. Since

hen I have been wondering 
whether it is wise to have 
iu aferation here before she

returis or to wait til in 
to becomes acute. I would

Woken an you coming back 
to Andover? I shall as 
on yon before I leave

de in de prata

e

a

les

given

summer

wishing on a

and 
me lo che Children 
Miss Clemons.

premlile

and to

will 
on il maller She had an 
X-ray fielen taken op te 
appendix yesterday and wie 
for fledre réommend me

Your very sceny 
. Sung Sing Kwan

U

o

mee

who will

Al Gora
raw: Received File y an opening in their Pekin office will then an lakind le charge of it finding yet uno I madecal college gul Rockeffeller Foundation Jo Lave work and two weeks and shall continue to work until tu 15th of seplember when I leave Besten for the west. Jam learning a great deal hem and have determined to stick as long as I have time I do so Ana 536 Commonwealet Ave Doston Mar Answered 522 19 August 22,1919 My dear to. Stearus, 1956 Miss Lee had a pretty bad allack of cronie appendicitis last week. Since hen I have been wondering whether it is wise to have iu aferation here before she returis or to wait til in to becomes acute. I would Woken an you coming back to Andover? I shall as on yon before I leave de in de prata e a les given summer wishing on a and me lo che Children Miss Clemons. premlile and to will on il maller She had an X-ray fielen taken op te appendix yesterday and wie for fledre réommend me Your very sceny . Sung Sing Kwan U o mee who will Al Gora

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter with details about Miss Lee's medical condition, Kwan's return to China after completing his studies at Harvard, and requesting a loan of $300 for that trip (Pages 1 and 4)
metadata.note_acquisition: Phillips Academy Archives and Special Collections received the letters and materials of Sung Sing Kwan from Alfred E. Stearns in ____(date)
metadata.note_preferred-citation: From The Trustees of Phillips Academy.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
